content.query:
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.usp_UpdateTableStatusandHistory   
    @SchemaName nvarchar(50),   
    @TableName nvarchar(50)  ,
    @DataLossPercentage int,
    @HugeDataLossPercentage int,
    @TotalSize BIGINT,
    @TotalRows BIGINT
AS   
 
-----------------------Update History Table------------------------------------- 
insert into Table_Stats_History(db_id,db_name,schema_id,schema_name,tbl_id,tbl_name,total_size,total_rows,created_date)
select   db_id,db_name,schema_id,schema_name,tbl_id,tbl_name,latest_total_size,latest_total_rows,getdate()
from audit.Table_Status
WHERE SCHEMA_NAME=@SchemaName and tbl_name=@TableName
order by created_date desc


-----------------------Perform  Merge------------------------------------- 
Declare @DataLossFlag BIT,@HugeDataLossFlag BIT

SELECT top 1 total_rows
FROM audit.Table_Stats_History
WHERE SCHEMA_NAME=@SchemaName and tbl_name=@TableName
ORDER BY created_date DESC





GO
